a: B.Tech in CS with a focus on ML; current research in LLM routing, RL for cost–accuracy, and systems efficiency.
Routing across models (ACE/H-ACE), uncertainty estimation at inference, prefix fan-out, and KV-cache reuse—optimizing accuracy under budget constraints.

q: Where are your papers and talks?
a: See the publications index and talks page for PDFs, code, and recordings.
